name: feederRL
description:
Install instructionsFeeder RL Kirby + pokemon breeding Eat or be eaten!
  • EAT your enemies
  • CONSUME them to use their abilities
  • BREED them inside your belly to make better abilities
Installation

None.

Playable in the browser. Upon request, I can make a build for your OS, just let me know.

Gameplay

Alternate between the dungeon and your belly, where things you ate can be used for abilities and to breed other mobs that eventually give you better abilities.

Controls
  • MOVE with WASD/arrow keys
  • CONSUME with SPACE
Acknowledgements Music
  • Main Title 確かな希望 by Makoto Hiramatsu
  • Dungeon music and Game Over OST by Null Confluence (CC BY-NC 4.0),
Art
  • DragonDePlatino's DawnLike tileset
  • DawnBringer's color palette
Code
  • rot.js for a great engine
  • My own base game template
Special
  • My dog for being awesome!
  • YOU for playing this game

Thanks for playing! Leave feedback of any kind here.

Thanks again!
